segments.text: Looking at the setup in this kitchen, I can’t help but feel discomfort.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pooling on the floor, a precursor to an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Watching the woman blissfully polish a plate while the chaos unfolds is infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no clue about the dangers looming behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I want to scream to make her aware, to pull her back into reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s funny how one mundane task can spiral into a collection of catastrophes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And yet, amid the chaos, there is something beautifully chaotic about it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
